title: My Pixel 3xl is not coming on
content:
My phone was working a few hours ago and kept in charge before sleeping last night.  When I woke in the morning it was completely dead.   

I tried leaving in charge for a couple of hours, but nothing is coming on (no battery indicator on screen).  I also tried plugging it into my laptop for 30 minutes and still no response.  

Finally tried to check if it is a screen problem by holding the power button for 30 minutes and waiting for 2 minutes afterward.  Still Nothing.

The charging cable and brick is original pixel's and my husband has pixel 2xl and when I plug it in with his device, it is charging perfectly fine.

Any other recommendations?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
